name: Example Organization
vision: Build great software with local LLMs

bottleneck_thresholds._comment: Thresholds for bottleneck detection - tune based on your hardware
bottleneck_thresholds._resource_normal_doc: Cards waiting for resources below this threshold = normal serial execution (no alert)
bottleneck_thresholds._resource_warning_doc: Cards waiting 4-10 = mild backlog (monitor but don't alert)
bottleneck_thresholds._resource_critical_doc: Cards waiting >10 = chronic bottleneck (alert and take action)
bottleneck_thresholds._dependency_warning_pct_doc: Alert if >50% of blocked cards are dependency-blocked
bottleneck_thresholds._human_attention_threshold_doc: Alert if any cards need human review/input
